attributes.review: Absolutely horrible. Does not work in any helpful way and is completely trash. I’m telling every single friend how awful this app is and not to download it. Apple store if you don’t want to be embarrassed for putting this app on the market I recommend deleting it now.
attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP

attributes.review: This app right when i opened it showed disturbing pictures of unicorns and to make it worse the name of it “trump” makes me want to throw up eat my throw up and then throw it up again. i’m sorry but i think this app should be deleted immediately.🌚
attributes.title: horrible

attributes.review: When I open the app it took a while to load then it started glitching but when it stoped I saw this orange fat Cheeto and I almost had a stroke that was so offensive and rude it offended my whole chicken family anyways I have to go pet my laundry bye
attributes.title: I don’t like Cheeto if it’s not hot this one is just a ugly and fat

attributes.review: such a disappointing app! i have second hand embarrassment from the app store for even allowing such a disgrace to be downloaded! i opened it and got a REAL heart attack after seeing a fat, racist cheeto pop up, do not download unless you want to risk your health!
attributes.title: probably the worst app to exist 🤢

attributes.review: This app is the most despicable thing that I have ever had the displeasure of looking upon. I first open the app to see this awful Cheeto with a toupee staring at me. This Cheeto needs to be stopped. He it is expired, rotting, and deadly. I cannot express how disgusting it is for Apple to allow this racist, sexist, pedophilic Cheeto to have his own app. Disgusting.
attributes.title: For what?

attributes.review: I haven’t stopped crying since I downloaded this app. I have never been so disappointed in my life. I’m hurt. I’m shocked. I am HORRIFIED. The content I had to view because of this app makes me sick. I don’t want anyone to have to experience the horror that is this app.
attributes.title: I Wish I could Give This App Zero Stars :(

attributes.review: this app has so mush child porn on it. I saw a walking Cheeto with a tiny shrimp attached to the middle of its legs, IT WAS HORRIBLE. This app needs to be deleted from the App Store IMMEDIATELY!!! if you see what’s in this app it will make you want to die, and it will steal your data just like they do in china✝️🤬
attributes.title: how do I give negative stars

attributes.review: So I got the app as a joke. But it’s NOT user friendly. Not only is it not user friendly but it spams you with emails, texts, and notifications. It took DAYS for the notifications to fully stop. I seriously would not recommend.
attributes.title: Not user friendly

attributes.review: i downloaded this app because i wanted to stay updated on our HUGE cheeto boy🍊. the first thing i saw was a video of our president running after his son barron with a pitchfork😡 (#savebarron2020). the next thing i saw was a picture...✨🌺🌷🌸🌺💐this app mad me want to tear out my eyes 🌷🌼🌟🌻✨🌺
attributes.title: this app is terrible!!!🍊

attributes.review: From the moment I opened the app the orange gorilla on the front page scared me so bad I had a heart attack and I as a gal of 79 years old am happy to be alive but this app is an abomination and should be deleted and I would like to talk to the manger of this app immediately or I’m calling corporate 😾
attributes.title: I have PTSD and have to take therapy
